Description:
2-Player Starter Set- All the dice you need to begin your adventures! 66% more health than our previous starters! (30 health of each race and 4 Dragons!)

Bring the flaming might of the Firewalkers and the sturdy power of the Treefolk to your battlefield.

The Starter Set has all two players need to begin their campaign: 28 six-sided unit dice, 4 ten-sided monster dice; 4 eight-sided terrain dice; 4 twelve-sided dragon dice. It also contains two paper play mats and the Starter Rule Book. You can combine starter sets or add more dice from kicker packs to expand your armies.

Name: Dragon Dice: Kicker Pack 2 – Firewalkers
Description:
Firewalkers- Fury from above! The versatile Firewalkers bring their battlelust to the fray.

From the fiery sun, they have come to join the life-and-death struggle for dominance of a young world. They are the Firewalkers, elemental beings who have mysterious reasons for joining the fray. Can your armies harness the might of the Firewalkers and attain victory? Or will their creatues, such as the mighty Phoenix, destroy your troops itself?
This Kicker Pack contains new dice to flesh out your DRAGON DICE forces, all awesome Firewalkers and Monsters of stunning mottled red and blue.

Includes 1 10-sided monster die and 7 6-sided unit dice (4 small 16mm, 2 medium 18mm, and 1 large 20mm) of the red and blue Firewalkers, plus the original rules folder.

Name: Dragon Dice: Dwarves
Description:
Return to the ancient days of creation in Esfah… and find that legends live!

The Dwarves have been on Esfah since the earliest ages. The power of Earth and Fire creates a hardy race born for the highlands. The Dwarves are tough and durable, and are fierce fighters on any terrain. Few races dare to challenge them in the mountains. Now available in a kicker pack, the Dwarves
also bring their monstrous allies, including the legendary beast Behemoth, making its first appearance in Dragon Dice™

Includes 1 10-sided monster die and 7 6-sided unit dice (4 small 16mm, 2 medium 18mm, and 1 large 20mm) of red and gold Dwarf, plus rules summary.

Name: Dragon Dice: Coral Elves
Description:
Return to the ancient days of creation in Esfah…and find that legends live!

In the beginning, there were the Coral Elves. The power of Water and Air created a race that flourished on the coasts, and produced mages and marksman of great skill. In the battle for control of Esfah, the fleet Coral Elves have proved themselves through the ages. Now available in a kicker pack, the Coral Elves also bring their monstrous allies, including the legendary beast Leviathan, making its first appearance in Dragon Dice™.

Each Coral Elf kicker box contains a random assortment of 7 6-sided dice: 4 small 16mm, 2 medium 18mm, and 1 large 20mm. They also include 1 random 22mm 10-sided monster die and a rules sheet.

Name: Dragon Dice: Goblins
Description:
Return to the ancient days of creation in Esfah… and find that legends live!

Death put forth his hand again and produced the Goblins to create more chaos on Esfah. This sturdy race of Earth and Death provided the shock troops for many a war in the land. Their power in melee and speed in the swamps enabled the Goblins to overrun many other races in the war for supremacy in Esfah. Now available in a kicker pack, the Goblins also bring their monstrous allies, including the legendary abomination Cannibal, making its first appearance in Dragon Dice™.

Includes 1 10-sided monster die and 7 6-sided unit dice (4 small 16mm, 2 medium 18mm, and 1 large 20mm) of black and gold Goblin, plus rules summary.

Name: Dragon Dice: Lava Elves
Description:
Return to the ancient days of creation in Esfah…and find that legends live!

The power of Lord Death, jealous of Nature, produced his own children. First came the Lava Elves, creatures of Fire and Death bred to conquer Esfah. With powerful magic and potent missiles, the unpredictable Lava Elves became the bane of the land, especially in their own Highlands. Now available in a kicker pack, the Lava Elves also bring their monstrous allies, including the legendary Lurker in the Dark, making its first appearance in Dragon Dice™.

Each Lava Elf kicker box contains a random assortment of 7 6-sided dice: 4 small 16mm, 2 medium 18mm, and 1 large 20mm. They also include 1 random 22mm 10-sided monster die and a rules sheet.

Name: Dragon Dice (Fourth Edition): Amazons
Description:
Return to the ancient days of creation in Esfah…and find that legends live!

Nature sought to gain advantage in the war again, bringing forth the swift and sure-handed Amazons. These fearsome female warriors and their War Chiefs raced across the fields of Esfah, raining missiles on the unwary and drawing on the elemental power of whatever terrain they trod. Now available in a kicker pack, the Amazons also bring their monstrous allies, including the legendary and frightening Nightmare, making its first appearance in Dragon Dice.

Name: Dragon Dice: Kicker Pack 3 – Undead
Description:
What happens in Esfah when the carnage continues to escalate? Lord Death raises the Undead to step into the battle for supremacy on the Dragon Dice field. Zombies, Skeletons, Vampires, Ghouls, Dracoliches, and other not-quite-dead-yet units await your commands!

The Undead are a powerful species in melee combat, combining strong offensive power with superior toughness. Undead mages come in two kinds, heavy and light magic, and use Black/Death magic to devastating effect with their own set of spells to add to the regular spell book. With their racial abilities, the Undead are hard to kill and harder to keep dead. Unlike the other species in the game, Undead have no missile units, so you’ll want to play to their strengths and crush those pesky archers.

Each Undead kicker box contains a random assortment of 7 6-sided dice: 4 small 16mm, 2 medium 18mm, and 1 large 20mm. The box also includes 1 random 22mm 10-sided monster die and a rules sheet.

Name: Dragon Dice: Kicker Pack 4 – The Feral
Description:
Feral- Nature raises up the beasts to fight on her behalf! The Feral are a fierce and prolific race.

Includes 1 10-sided Elder (monster) die and 7 6-sided unit dice (4 small 16mm, 2 medium 18mm, and 1 large 20mm) of the blue and gold Feral.

Name: Dragon Dice: Kicker Pack 5 – Swamp Stalkers
Description:
A new horror arises to challenge the ancient powers in Esfah!

From the fetid swamps of Esfah, the Swamp Stalkers slithered into the battles that raged in the land. Fearsome mutants created by Death from other species, these creatures of Water and Death bring powerful melee troops and the magic of death and decay with them. Jagged swords, hurled forks, and reptilian eyes abound as these foul abominations roam your battlefields. Can you harness the horror of these swamp troops and their allied monsters to roll to victory in Esfah?

Includes 1 10-sided monster die and 7 6-sided unit dice (4 small 16mm, 2 medium 18mm, and 1 large 20mm) of black and green Swamp Stalkers.

Name: Dragon Dice: Kicker Pack 6 – Frostwings
Description:
Frostwings- This kicker puts the flight speed and deadly missile strength of the Frostwings under your command.

Includes 1 10-sided monster die and 7 6-sided unit dice (4 small 16mm, 2 medium 18mm, and 1 large 20mm) of blue and black Frostwings, plus the updated rules folder.

Name: Dragon Dice: Kicker Pack 7 – Scalders
Description:
Once the fire starts, there's no quenching it! Nature stretched out her hand once more, but neither she nor Death could control her newest creations. The forgotten children of Nature. Scalders now bring their desire to set the world aflame to your battlefields. Creatures of fire and water, their flaming clubs, fiery arrows, and steaming charms provide a wild new race to command. Now you can harness the wrath of the Scalders and their allied monsters to scorch your way to victory in Esfab!

Includes 1 10-sided monster die and 7 6-sided unit dice (4 small 16mm, 2 medium 18mm, and 1 large 20mm) of red and green Scalders, plus the updated rules folder.

Name: Skull Crusher
Description:
Skull Crusher is a game for anyone who...has a pile of half painted plastic and metal miniatures taunting him from the shelf...Skull Crusher is a fantasy skirmish wargame that has no illusions about itself.  It's full rules fill a whole four pages.  It has no "pseudo-historical" backstory.  It's probably family friendly as long as it isn't played while drunk.  It welcomes all fantasy miniatures into play, regardless of origin, base, or painted condition.

-description from the publisher

Skull Crusher is a lightweight, tabletop miniatures wargame for two teams.  Opposing armies contains units purchased from a points pool.  Individual units are equipped with "whatever can actually be seen" - and such equipment adds to the point cost of the unit.  Attacks are made with whatever type of equipment the unit has, including mêlée or ranged attacks.  Play proceeds in turns, with players alternating.  Unit movement is performed in inches - if the play area is using terrain, it must be navigated around.  Units receiving enough damage are removed from play.  The game is won by the player who is not eliminated.

—user summary

Name: Dragon Dice: White Dragons Expansion
Description: White Dragons - White dragons are much tougher that normal dragons. They have double the health (10) and do twice as much damage. In other words, Claws do 12 points, Wings do 10 points, Tails do 6 (and reroll), Jaws do a whopping 24 points! Even the Treasure is twice as much, allowing 2 units to promote. However, there is a price for this; a white dragon replaces 2 normal dragons and takes twice as much magic to summon. So in a 36-health game, you could either bring 2 normal dragons or 1 white dragon. Any color dragon summoning spell can summon a white dragon, however, it takes 14 points of magic instead of 7. See the rules for more information.

Name: Dragon Dice: Kicker Pack 8 – Treefolk
Description:
Treefolk- Nature again strengthens her children with the steady toughness of the Treefolk.

Includes 1 10-sided monster die and 7 6-sided unit dice (4 small 16mm, 2 medium 18mm, and 1 large 20mm) of green and gold Treefolk, plus rules folder.

Name: Dragon Dice: Acolytes of Eldarim Expansion
Description:
The mysterious Eldarim have begun to teach their singular elemental skills to a few chosen Acolytes, who have abandoned their species traditions to become a new species in Esfah. Your battles will be enhanced by using the powerful Dragonmasters and Dragonhunters, the single-element Acolytes of the Eldarim, and the protective Dragonkin whose elemental nature links them with the Eldarim.

This kicker pack contains Acolytes of Eldarim: 6 small 16mm Acolytes, 3 medium 18mm Acolytes, and 2 large 20mm Acolytes; in a random assortment of types and colors.

Champions of this species are sold separately.
